description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Pictorical History of the United States of America, from the earliest period to the close of President Taylor's Administration ... with additions and corrections, by H. Croome" Author: Murray, Hugh Contributor: Croome, William Contributor: WATSON, Henry C. - of Philadelphia Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9603.eee.12." Page: 507 Place of Publishing: Boston [Mass.] Date of Publishing: 1861 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002590468 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
